Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsMy name is Karl Michaelis, I early in the morning on January 24, 2012 I was feeling very angry and focused on my thoughts knowing that my family didn't know me well enough to get me something that demonstrates they know me. I crouched down, then focused on "Our brethren" saying aloud and in my head in unison "I know you are there and listening. My birthday is my one day I feel is special but I know it wouldn't be... I can feel it. If I am worth the risk would you show yourselves to me? I know at ten I will probably not be outside but if you could ensure that my dad and brother see you as well as come get me along with my camera, I would also greatly appreciate it . I understand that you run the risk of being attacked, but if you could find it within you to do so... It would mean a lot to me personally. It would be the best present I could hope for, thank you for your time in listening to me and safe travels." After my family did what I knew they would, I was enraged so much to the point that family members and friends alike could feel a vibration coming from me. Then as I was working on my school work my brother ran to my bedroom window saying "Karl! Karl! You NEED to get out here right now!" I replied "Why what's going on?" He replied "Something is out here flying around you need to come see THIS! Bring your camera!" I jumped out with my camera and began taking pictures at 22:05 the event lasted for about 25 min's (Shortest) 35 min's (Max). It moved up and down left and right I would say it was about a Mile and a half away but was defiantly big, not because the light was bright but because I could size it up fairly well. I have 35 pic's from this event.
